definitions.definition: Feeling honoured (by something); feeling happy or satisfied about an event or fact; gratified.
definitions.example: I am proud of Sivu’s schoolwork.

definitions.definition: Possessed of a due sense of what one deserves or is worth.
definitions.example: I was too proud to apologise.

definitions.definition: Having too high an opinion of oneself; arrogant, supercilious.
Generating a sense of pride; being a cause for pride.
definitions.example: It was a proud day when we finally won the championship.

definitions.definition: (Of things) standing upwards as in the manner of a proud person; stately or majestic.

definitions.example: After it had healed, the scar tissue stood proud of his flesh.

definitions.definition: Excited by sexual desire; specifically of a female animal: in heat.
